ComicInfo.Title: "Has the mother ship responded yet?" [Tech Jacket Chapter 5 of 8]
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE VILTRUMITE WAR CONTINUES!
Invincible and the Coalition of Planets bring the war to Planet Viltrum! All bets are off as the Coalition forces try to fight their way into the Viltrumite Empireâ€™s stronghold. Lives are lost, and the war reaches a turning point. This issue features as special, over-sized main story and an extra special Science Dog back-up story by ROBERT KIRKMAN and CORY WALKER.
